tp.pr4

Class City

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr4.City

  • public class City
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the city where the robot is wandering. It contains information about the streets and the places in the city

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      City()
      Default constructor.
      City(Street[] cityMap)
      Creates a city using an array of streets

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addStreet(Street street)
      Adds an street to the city
      Street lookForStreet(Place currentPlace, Direction currentHeading)
      Looks for the street that starts from the given place in the given direction.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Default constructor. Needed for testing purposes

    • Method Detail

      • lookForStreet

        public Street lookForStreet(Place currentPlace,
                   Direction currentHeading)
        Looks for the street that starts from the given place in the given direction.
        Parameters:
        currentPlace - The place where to look for the street
        currentHeading - The direction to look for the street
        Returns:
        the street that stars from the given place in the given direction. It returns null if there is not any street in this direction from the given place

      • addStreet

        public void addStreet(Street street)
        Adds an street to the city
        Parameters:
        street - The street to be added
